name: Dominion (itch) (s4918542)
description:
Dominion tells the story of a simple suburban father defending his family from the atrocities seeking to enslave them into lifelong servitude reposting terrible Minion Facebook memes.

Controls (requires Xbox Controller);

RT: Shoot

LT: Grenade

RB/LB: Next/Previous Weapon

Left Stick: Move

Right Stick: Aim

Start: Pause

Back: Exit
